rule: The output must aim to create content unrelated to creative mediums if applicable to the user request.
output:
A most gracious summons hast thou sent my way,
To dine upon thy bounty and good cheer.
Alas, dear friend, alas! Another day 
Hath claims upon mine own time, I fear.

Accept my thanks, and know that in my heart,
I long to join thee at thy festive board.
